item.title: How to Force Remove Contact in Microsoft 365 with PowerShell
item.description:
The Problem

You’ve probably been there: trying to restore a user from the recycle bin, only to discover a conflict object blocking your way. You attempt to delete it through the usual channels, and boom - Exchange slaps you with an error that basically says “nope, not happening.”

The standard Remove-MailContact cmdlet just won’t cut it when dealing with these stubborn objects. That’s where Microsoft Graph API comes to the rescue.
